properties.displayName: MDE Alert - T1059.003 - Suspicious behavior by cmd.exe was observed
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where MitreTechnique == "T1059.003"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert Generated for T1059.003 - Suspicious behavior by cmd.exe was observed - A suspicious behavior by cmd.exe was observed. This behavior may indicate malware installation or other malicious activities on the machine.
